title: Why Financial Capability Matters
summary: In this blog post, Graham Macmillan, Senior Program Officer at the Citi Foundation, and Mike Kubzansky, co-leader of the Monitor Group's Inclusive Markets practice worldwide, outline the business case for financial capability-addressing how financial services providers could be incentivized to pay for these interventions for their clients. This blog builds on the Bridging the Gap report, published by Monitor and Partners for Sustainable Development and funded by the Citi Foundation.
